snippet: Judging by the crowds streaming into Barclays Center in Brooklyn for the first Rolling Stones concert in the city since 2006, many of their fans are aging as gracefully as the band.
abstract: Judging by the crowds streaming into Barclays Center in Brooklyn for the first Rolling Stones concert in the city since 2006, many of their fans are aging as gracefully as the band.

headline.main: Like the Band They Follow, Stones Fans Are Grayer but Still Spry
